author: poojaranjan
content: Yes, we are on the usual schedule on alternate Wednesday at 1500 UTC.

author: poojaranjan
content:
In the last meeting, the group discussed to flesh out the current proposal of future EIP process and possible onboarding of EIP editors who have been contributing actively. 
It would be nice to have your input for these discussions in the upcoming meetings.

author: gcolvin
content: Thanks <@!642887713246150666>.  I'll check out the recording when you share it.

author: poojaranjan
content: The recording is available https://youtu.be/ATlQApSKDeM. Notes will be up soon.
